usa: The First Transcontinental Railroad is completed at Promontory Summit, Utah Territory.<sup id="cite_ref-WDL_1-0" class="reference">[1]</sup>
Women's suffrage leaders Susan B. Anthony and Elizabeth Cady Stanton found the National Woman Suffrage Association.
india:
Mahatma Gandhi is born (to 30 January 1948)

Thakkar Bapa is Born (to 1951)
australia: Children of Australian Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander descent are removed from their families by Australian and State government agencies. This practice lasted 100 years and is known as the Stolen Generation.
